sentences.en: All flood victims will be rehoused as soon as possible.
sentences.cn: 所有水灾灾民都将尽快得到安置。

sentences.en: If sea levels go up, do you build sea walls or rehouse people?
sentences.cn: 如果海平面上升, 是修建海堤还是重新安置居民?

sentences.en: It is not very easy to rehouse those works of art which have been spared.
sentences.cn: 给幸免毁灭的艺术品重找安身之地并非易事.

sentences.en: The council has agreed to rehouse the family.
sentences.cn: 委员会同意给这个家庭重新安排住房。

trans.tran_en: If someone is rehoused, their local government or other authority provides them with a different house to live in
